this_title: Scary, Unnerving Experiences Filming Ghost Documentary: Are These Paranormal Experiences Incidents?
introduction: Dan Bell re-investigates footage from a 2010 exploration of an abandoned asylum and makes another visit to Baltimore's decaying Uplands mansion. Joined on both trips by co star Rick Serra, this eerie documentary is presented with an objective point of view, allowing viewers to decide for themselves the origins of the unusual sounds captured here.
chinese_title: Scary, Unnerving Experiences Filming Ghost Documentary: Are These Paranormal Experiences Incidents?
